data

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Point

  • public class Point
extends Object
    A point is composed of one or more attributes or features. It has an array with its values of each feature. It also stores information about the features wich have missed values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point(float[] values) 
      Point(float[] values, Set<Integer> missedFeatures)
      Create a new point.

      • squaredEuclidianDistance

        public Double squaredEuclidianDistance(DataSet ds,
                                       Point target)
        Calculate the Squared Euclidean Distance from the point to another point. It place progressively greater weight on objects that are farther apart.
        Parameters:
        ds - dataset
        target - point
        Returns:
        Squared Euclidean Distance
